alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 5:41AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Camden, southwestern Glynn, east central Pierce, northeastern Brantley and south central Wayne Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 541 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raybon, or near Nahunta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Raybon, Waverly, Waynesville, Atkinson and Hortense. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Pierce; Wayne
